name: Leer: Night Shift
description:
Synopsis

Keiri, a poverty-stricken girl, is delivering letters at night. Since no one else wanted the job, the reward is substantial. Meanwhile, a serial killer known as "The Neck Ripper" lurks somewhere nearby...

Remastered in 3D

Play the original experience of "Leer" remastered in 3D graphics. You can choose one of four difficulty settings to match your skill level.

Controls
  • WASD - Movement
  • Escape - Menu
  • Left Mouse Button - Interact
  • Left Shift - Sprint
